Extract chr columns needing to be converted to numeric
BA 7, OBP 8, SLG 9, 
```{r}
colChange <- function(x){
  # Extract colnames of character columns to be converted to numeric
  nameCols <- colnames(x)[6:ncol(x)]
  # Convert to numeric based on col subset
  x[nameCols] <- sapply(x[nameCols], as.numeric)
  
  # Return results
  x
}

```

```{r}
# Applying column changing function to convert chr to numeric where needed
mvp <- colChange(mvp)
cyyoung <- colChange(cyyoung)
rook <- colChange(rook)

```
